title: Error 004 what can i do ? :/
body: Some sugestions about this ? patching failed error 004

replies.body: Typically that 004 error can be a good sign that your OS is blocking the program from running. Double check that you have all the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) set up for League to be able to run normally, but hit me back up if that doesn't help!
it is happening to me while i want to join the pbe server and it never fixes if i restart the client

> [{quoted}](name=SWAG8807,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pksLPmYv,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-15T10:50:35.504+0000)
>
> Some sugestions about this ? patching failed error 004

try to click on "mechanic icon" near exit and minimize.  At general you will find on bottom "Initiate Full Repair". If this also doesnt work, reinstall game :)
